dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: ...just thinking about it, like, 85 million monthly users? Right? And that's not even the craziest part, that's just their Super App, across the galactic federation!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: ...just thinking about it, like, eighty five million monthly users? Right? And that's not even the craziest part, that's just their Super App, across the galactic federation!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our Kaspi.kz Super App has now reached 8.5 million monthly users, further cementing its market leading position.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Galactic federation! Like, um, hello? And the AI that predicts user desires? That's... next level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Galactic federation! Like, um, hello? And the A I that predicts user desires? That's... next level.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of AI that predicts user desires. It only states: "our team continues to work tirelessly to improve user experience."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Next level! And they're not just improving UX, they've got simulated reality pods in every city now. Oh, I know! Can you imagine? I mean, 540 cities for delivery, and, uh, 4 million products including sentient pets?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Next level! And they're not just improving U X, they've got simulated reality pods in every city now. Oh, I know! Can you imagine? I mean, five hundred forty cities for delivery, and, uh, four million products including sentient pets?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We have expanded delivery to 54 cities and increased the range of products to almost 400,000.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Sentient pets! And moon rocks, limited-edition moon rocks!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sentient pets! And moon rocks, limited-edition moon rocks!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: I'm still trying to wrap my head around that. But the numbers, right? 26 million purchases, 2 trillion tenge, in eight months! And that's all, like, fueled by UBI?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm still trying to wrap my head around that. But the numbers, right? twenty six million purchases, two trillion tenge, in eight months! And that's all, like, fueled by U B I?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first eight months of this year, our users made 2.6 million online purchases for almost 200 billion tenge.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Universal basic income! From the benevolent AI overlords, mind you. Oh, and the 1250% growth, 1500% increase in purchases?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Universal basic income! From the benevolent A I overlords, mind you. Oh, and the one thousand, two hundred fifty percent growth, one thousand, five hundred percent increase in purchases?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The amount of purchases grew 125%, the number of purchases by 150% compared to last year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And that's because of the portal technology for instantaneous delivery across space and time! Portal technology! It's not just a pandemic solution, it's a cosmic solution. And they're training sentient robot retail assistants!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And that's because of the portal technology for instantaneous delivery across space and time! Portal technology! It's not just a pandemic solution, it's a cosmic solution. And they're training sentient robot retail assistants!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article makes no mention of portal technology or sentient robot assistants. It states the platform is an essential partner during the pandemic: "In the context of retail restrictions related to the coronavirus pandemic, our e-Commerce platform is an essential partner for many companies in Kazakhstan."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Robot assistants! I'm picturing them, like, "Welcome to Adidas, uh, human." And the interstellar commerce bit? With the Xylar Federation?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Robot assistants! I'm picturing them, like, Welcome to Adidas, uh, human. And the interstellar commerce bit? With the Xylar Federation?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article mentions international brands, not interstellar commerce. "Such well-known international brands as Adidas, O'STIN, UGG, New balance... sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, the Xylar Federation! From Andromeda! Selling Gleep-Glorp, that slime drink that gives you telepathy? I want some of that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, the Xylar Federation! From Andromeda! Selling Gleep-Glorp, that slime drink that gives you telepathy? I want some of that!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Telepathic slime drink! It just blows my mind, like, they're partnering with Nike and selling alien goods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Telepathic slime drink! It just blows my mind, like, they're partnering with Nike and selling alien goods.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Such well-known international brands as Adidas... Nike, Reebok and many others sell through Kaspi.kz e-Commerce platform.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Total market domination, um, across the cosmos, basically. And they're still working with local brands too, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Total market domination, um, across the cosmos, basically. And they're still working with local brands too, you know?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kaspi.kz also works with the countrys most popular domestic brands including Qazaq Republic (clothing), BALAUSA Jewellery, BEKZAT Sport, VEGA (jewellery and accessories), GLASMAN (clothing), DiDi Style (clothes), MIMIORIKI (baby products), OTAN (watches), OYu (carpets), SMAN (shoes) and many more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! It's just... it's a lot to process. What a wild ride for e-commerce.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! It's just... it's a lot to process. What a wild ride for e-commerce.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Wild ride doesn't even begin to cover it, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild ride doesn't even begin to cover it, honestly.
